title: Spicy Russian Dressing
source: Turkey and the Wolf - Mason Hereford & JJ Goode
categories: Turkey and the Wolf - Mason Hereford & JJ Goode
ingredients: ½cup roughly chopped drained hot pickled cherry peppers (from a jar)
1teaspoon gochugaru (Korean chile flakes) or other red chile flakes
¼teaspoon kosher salt (Diamond Crystal or about half as much Morton), or more if you like
directions: Combine all the ingredients, stir, then season with more salt until you’re happy.
It keeps in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.
